reference.title: GoOnline : To enable all event handlers

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will enable all handlers. The return value of this function will be 0 or 1. This function can return 0 in case handlers are already enabled, i.e. "All Handler" toolbar/menu is already enabled.

section.title: Returns
section.p: A value zero indicate failure condition while a value 1 indicate a success condition.
